title: Create a Channel
name: createChannelByConnectorId
description: Creates a channel only with parameters provided.

Success 200.description: Channel token, only present if a token has been set
Channel userName, only present if a username has been set
Channel apiKey, only present if an api key has been set

409 Conflict - slug already taken.description: Returned if slug is already taken in the current Connector scope

Parameter.description: Slug of the Channel to be deleted

404 Not Found.description: Returned if either the Connector or the Channel doesn't exist
Return if either the Connector or the Channel doesn't exist

Success 200.description: if false, incoming messages won't be forwarded to the bot

404 Not Found - Connector or Channel not.description: indicates whether the Connector or the Channel doesn't exist

title: Post a message to a specific bot
name: Post_a_message_to_a_bot
description: Post a message to a specific bot. With this route, you do not have to only answer to a user in response to a previous message, we can also directly send them messages

Quick replies parameters.description: Title of a quick reply button. This title will appear on channel UI
Value of a quick reply button. This title will not appear on channel UI, but this will be sent to your bot if user click on it

Card message parameters.description: Title of the card button. This title will appear on channel UI
Value of the card button. This title will not appear on channel UI, but this will be sent to your bot if user click on it
